name: iBot Group Logging
description: With iBot Group Logging you can log all group shouts, and wall posts in a discord channel, easily.

group.description: The ID of the group you wish to log.

username.description: Username of a roblox account, we need to login to an account in order to see the shouts and wall posts!

wallurl.description: Discord webhook url in the channel you wish to send wall logs (optional).

shouturl.description: Discord webhook url in the channel you wish to send shout logs (optional).
